resources.string: Alerts you if you need to start the app. Should be high priority.
Não foi possível criar sua carteira.\nReason: %1$s
Não importe uma seed que tenha sido gerada em outro aplicativo.\n\nAlém disso, certifique-se que você não tem outra carteira Phoenix instalada com a mesma seed.
A seed da sua carteira é uma lista com 12 palavras escritas em inglês. Please note that passphrases are not supported.
Use o teclado abaixo para inserir a seed:
Esta seed é inválida e não pode ser importada.\n\nTente novamente
O código PIN deve conter 6 números.

O aplicativo não pôde ser iniciado.\n\nDetalhes do erro: %1$s
Não foi possível ler os dados da carteira, favor reiniciar o aplicativo
Sua conexão de internet não está funcionando. Favor verificar sua conexão WiFi ou rede de celular.
Você pode alterar o valor solicitado e a descrição da cobrança.
Ocorreu um erro ao gerar a cobrança…\n\nTente novamente.
Compartilhe esta solicitação de pagamento com…
Você está no modo de economia de energia. Para receber o pagamento, verifique se o aplicativo pode ser executado em segundo plano.
Ocorreu um erro ao enviar essa transação pela rede bitcoin…\n\nTente novamente.
Solicitando um endereço de bitcoin swap-in…

A standard bitcoin address will be displayed next.

Os bitcoins enviados para este endereço serão mostrados na sua carteira após uma confirmação.

A %1$s%% taxa será cobrada.

In order to receive payments on Lightning, you need to have a channel with enough inbound liquidity.\n\nIf you don\'t have one, Phoenix will automatically create a channel on-the-fly as needed. The setup fee covers the cost of creating the channel and allocating liquidity to it.
Você tem um pagamento pendente de recebimento de
Accepting this payment requires a setup fee of %1$s (%2$s).
This payment is not valid. You may have scanned an incorrect invoice.\n\nPlease try again.
O valor excede o seu saldo.
There was an internal error when trying to send this payment. No money was sent.
Swap has failed. Please try again.
This is a bitcoin address, the payment will be a swap.
Total exceeds your balance.\n\nLower the amount, or try again later when fees have decreased.
Place a payment request QR code\ninside the rectangle to scan it
This is not a valid payment request.\n\nPlease try again.
Você não pode pagar a si mesmo.
This invoice does not use the same blockchain as your wallet.
This LNURL is not supported yet!

This invoice doesn\'t include an amount. This may be dangerous: malicious nodes may be able to steal your payment. To be safe, you should ask the payee to specify an amount in the payment request.

Are you sure you want to pay this invoice?
A cheating attempt has been detected.
The background watcher needs internet to function properly.
You currently have %1$d Lightning channels with an aggregated balance of %2$s.
You currently don\'t have any channels that could be emptied.\n\nGo to the \'List channels\' page to see the state of your channels.
Use this page to empty your wallet to a Bitcoin address.
Funds can be sent to a Bitcoin wallet. Make sure that the address is correct before sending.

Force close allows you to unilaterally close your channels.

This feature is not a "fix everything magic button"; it is here as a safety measure and should only be used in extreme scenarii. For example, if your peer (ACINQ) disappears permanently, preventing you from spending your money. In all other cases, if you experience issues with Phoenix you should contact support.

Force closing channels will cost you money (to cover the on-chain fees) and will cause your funds to be locked for days. Do not uninstall the app until your channels are fully closed or you will lose money.

Funds will eventually be sent to: %1$s

Do not use this feature if you don\'t fully understand what it does.
Tem certeza de que deseja continuar?
Ocorreu um erro ao recuperar a lista de canais. Tente novamente.

Não foi possível recuperar os dados do canal> Recuperando dados do canal… Não foi possível recuperar os detalhes deste canal. Tente novamente mais tarde. Configurações Enviar Receber Nova carteira Restaurar minha arteirac Conectando ao servidor electrum… Você está offline. Verifique suas configurações de rede… Não foi possível acessar a rede Lightning… Configurações +%1$s incoming FAQ Stores Sua carteira não está protegida. Insira um PIN Obrigado por usar a Phoenix. Você já fez o backup da carteira? Backup my wallet Phoenix needs to be able to run in background from time to time. Make sure your device does not aggressively kill this app for battery savings. An update for this app is available. A critical update is available. The wallet may malfunction if not updated. Wallet recovery phrase Display seed Unlocking seed… Seed could not be read. Please try again.\n\nReason: %1$s This list of words is your wallet backup. Save it somewhere safe (not on this phone)!

Do not share it with anyone. Do not lose it. If you lose your words list and your phone, you\'ve lost your funds. BIP39 seed with standard BIP84 derivation path #%1$d %2$s I have made a backup of my seed Confirm Application logs You can extract and share the application logs from this page. View logs… View logs with… Share logs… Phoenix App logs Share Phoenix logs… Retrieving payment details… There was an error when retrieving the details for this payment.\n\nPlease try again. Sent %1$s Pending… Payment failed.
No money has been sent. Payment has not been received yet. Received %1$s Desc. Sent to Fees Error Payment for closing channel #%1$s No description Show technical data Payment data Payment Hash Payment Request Preimage Created at Expires at Completed at Funding tx is being confirmed Channel is closing Channel has been closed Up and running Synchronizing with peer Peer is offline Shutdown Security We highly recommend setting a PIN to protect your wallet. If your device supports it, you can use biometric authentication. PIN authentication Biometric authentication Change my PIN… Biometric enrollment failed. Please try again. Please enter your current PIN to proceed Please enter your new PIN Please confirm your new PIN PIN successfully updated! Biometric authentication activated Biometric authentication disabled Your device does not support biometric authentication. Biometric hardware is not available. Try again later. Please enroll biometric first. Invalid PIN PINs do not match. Please try again. There was an error, the wallet has not been encrypted.\n\nPlease try again. Disable biometric lock You will have to use your PIN code from now Cancel Enable biometric lock Cancel Log in to %1$s Log in Logging in, please wait… Retrieving payment details… Could not get a valid invoice from %1$s.\n\nYou may want to try again later. Could not get a valid invoice from %1$s (code %2$s).\n\nYou may want to try again later. There was an error when handling this invoice. Please try again later. Amount to receive Details Withdraw funds from
%1$s. Withdraw Requesting funds… Please hold while %1$s is sending funds.\n\nKeep the app online. Could not process this withdrawal request. Please try again. This withdrawal request is invalid. Please try again. Amount is invalid. Amount must be at least %1$s. Amount cannot exceed %1$s. %1$s responded with an error: %2$s.\n\nTry again later, or contact their support. Invalid data Display options Bitcoin unit Fiat currency Application theme Electrum server By default Phoenix connects to random electrum servers in order to access the Bitcoin blockchain. You can also choose to connect to your own Electrum server. Set server… Block height Tip timestamp Fee rate Master public key %1$s\n\nPath: %2$s %1$s sat/byte Server Establishing connection… Establishing connection with %1$s… Connected to: %1$s Use a custom Electrum server Server must have a valid certificate Server address (host:port). Please enter an electrum server address Fees Settings These are the fees used for sending or receiving money with Phoenix. Lightning payment The app will try to use the cheapest fee possible. Lorem ipsum At most %1$s + %2$s%% Onchain → Lightning This fee covers the cost of opening a Lightning channel, which involves an on-chain transaction. Add whitespace Delete last character
